Summary: Dim and sometimes bright round object seen slowly traversing high in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsDecember 14, 2010 For the 4th straight days in a row now, I been seeing this small, white and round object just appear in the air from my prospective in the same general area in the sky around 1:15 PM in Mesa, AZ. I filed a report yesterday alerting everyone to be on the lookout for this object. If you weren't able to observe the object yourself, the pictures attached is what I took of it today. Tomorrow is forecast to be cloudy. Information about the object can be seen in December 13, 2010 report that I filed.
